storyInfo: Vermeil makes up her mind to go on her final mission, in exchange for her right to remain at Rhodes Island. However, it's all just an unfortunate little misunderstanding.

attributes.content: 11:00 A.M. \ Sunny, clear
Rhodes Island Dormitories
A heavy pelt tightly covers the window, the room barely illuminated by a cluster of candles.
A small Vulpo girl raises her bow and nocks an arrow, cautiously looking ahead.
...The terminal's ringing.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Noisy... How do I use this thing again?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Vermeil...
Huh, where'd it go... Sorry, Vermeil, give me a sec. That's weird, I could've sworn I just put it in the toolbox.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Oh, here it is! How'd it end up in the accessories box? Sorry to keep you waiting–– Hibiscus? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Adnachiel, have you seen Vermeil?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I was just about to ask you. She was here a moment ago.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I was adjusting her prosthetics and wanted to grab her some snacks, but she disappeared in the blink of an eye.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Any idea where she might be going next?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Didn't ask. She's been on leave lately, right? She could be pretty much anywhere.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Though, you look like you're in quite a rush... Did something happen with her?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: She... She had an Oripathy treatment scheduled for today, but didn't show up at Medical this afternoon and also cancelled all her appointments.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: After I heard the news, I went over to her dorm, only to find that she wasn't there either. A lot of stuff seemed to be missing from her room too.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I asked around, and nobody seemed to know where she went. The people who did see her said she was heading out.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That doesn't sound right. When she came to see me, she didn't seem to be acting particularly strangely. That said, there was one thing that stuck out.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: After I finished the tune-up, she suddenly gave me a gift with no explanation. The old her wouldn't have done anything like that, right?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: What did she give you? Mind if I take a look?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Here, it's this.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: A beast tooth necklace...
attributes.name: Hibiscus
Adnachiel
attributes.content: By the way, Hibiscus, since you're already here, want to try the dessert I just made––

attributes.name: Adnachiel
attributes.content: Hey, don't just get up and leave like that!
Sorry, next time! Promise! I need to find Vermeil first and see what's going on.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Those are some serious bags around your eyes, Lina. Have you not been sleeping well lately?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: It's nothing to worry about, just dealing with a bit of overtime. You know how many field operators have been coming back from their missions lately, so Medical's been swamped all of a sudden.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: But that's perfectly normal. Lots of our seniors work way more overtime than we do, and once we get over the hump it should be smooth sailing.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: (Stops walking)
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: That's how life in the Medical Department goes. Sometimes you're crazy busy, other times there's not a whole lot to do. So don't worry, I'll be catching up on that sleep debt soon enou–– Whooa!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Vermeil? When did you get here?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: And what are you doing lugging around all this stuff? Are you visiting home? Or maybe going on a trip to Dossoles?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I'm not going home...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Do you know where I can find medicinal herbs on Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Oh, are you not feeling well? I can do a quick check-up for you for right now, or take you down to Medical...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm fine. Just wanted to know where I can find some herbs. Do you know?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: If you want herbs, I heard that Miss Lena has a variety of plants and flowers over at the Convalescent Garden. You might find something with medicinal value there.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Thanks. I'll go look for her.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Oh, this is for you.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: A polished bone fragment? ...What's it for?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd she go?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Coming, coming.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Podenco, please don't bring any more orders here at this hour... Huh?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Lena...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Oh, Vermeil? Please, come in.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Sorry, you're usually out in the field, so I didn't expect to see you in the rest area. It's quite unusual for you to come looking for me without notice.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Is there anything I can help you with?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'd like a few types of herbs. Do you have them here?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: You're looking for plants with medicinal properties? No problem. Just tell me their names.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: ...I don't know what they're called, but I'll know when I see them.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Hmm... Then come take a look around the courtyard with me.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Did you find any of the plants you were looking for?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: This one, this one, and that grass with the little red flowers.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: (All flowers with soothing and calming properties...)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Anything else? ...Hm?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Do you have that kind of grass... with a bunch of little bumps on the leaves?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Grass with bumps on the leaves? Oh, are you talking about motherwort? It does help regulate emotions, so I planted some in the garden.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If you cut your neck, you can chew 'em into pieces and stick it on the wound, and it won't hurt anymore.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Ehh...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Those vines are very durable. Can use them to break bones.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ...Let's not worry about that for now, Vermeil. Do you need any other plants?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: No, I'm good now.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Here, I've put everything in this box.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: These herbs are all very valuable, so I'll need to think about what I can offer in exchange for them.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Exchange?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I can't give you my bow, or my arm... The only other thing of value I have on me is this dagger.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: There's no need for that. Here, just take them. You don't need to pay me for some herbs and flowers; there's plenty more in the garden.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: No. A hunt in exchange for a bounty, a job in exchange for a meal.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: A dagger... in exchange for Lena's herbs.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Vermeil, I don't need you to do that for me. Did something happen?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Not good enough? Then I'll think of something else I can give you...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: That's not what I meant. The dagger's quite nice... Ugh, fine, maybe I can find some use for it around the garden... Alright, I'll take the dagger, okay?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: But listen to me – don't go around pushing your stuff onto other people in the future! Got it?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'll be taking the herbs then. Thank you. ...Bye, Lena.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Wait, Vermeil. I wanted to ask you – what... are you going to do with those plants?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Lena, I don't want to go yet.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: And that's what happened... By the time I got to the door, she was already gone without a trace.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Thank you... *sigh* Sounds like we'll need to look elsewhere. Hypothetically, if she needed to process the herbs next, then the lab would make sense... I'll head over and take a look.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, what did Vermeil mean when she said that? ...Is she going to leave Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: HR hasn't received a letter of resignation. She's been performing exceptionally in her field operations, and there's no way she failed her provisionary period.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: So... I'm just as confused about her situation as you are.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What I'm more worried about is whether Executor told her properly when he first brought her here. That her home is—
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Don't worry, Lena.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Whatever prompted her to do all this, I'm not letting her go until I hear the full truth from her.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm not allowed in right now?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Sorry, the kitchen's already closed for the day.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Kitchenware. Where can I get kitchenware... I remember seeing instant noodle bowls in someone's office...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Hold on a moment, please. Judging from your appearance, are you about to head out on a mission?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: My goodness. You can't just set off for a long journey on an empty stomach... I might have some dried food and canned sandworms in my room. I'll go grab them for you right now.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Could you keep an eye on this place while I'm gone? I'm in charge of security tonight, since people have been breaking into the kitchen and cafeteria in the dead of night.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Appreciate it! I'll be right back!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: So, I can go into the back kitchen. Understood.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: What a sturdy metal door. Is this... a protective net?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Almost like it's been designed to keep out feral beasts. As expected of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: You can't get in without a staff member's badge. Is there any other way in... Hmm, there's a keyhole hidden underneath, which can probably be picked.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: But... I gave my dagger to Lena.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ♪Hummm.... Hmm-hmm.... Hmmm...♪
Huh?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ...Hmm? This isn't the bar. It's—
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Shoot, I got way too absorbed in my music and I ended up walking all the way to the cafeteria.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I need to head back now, or I'll miss the last batch of fins and chips...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Who's there?! ––Huh? Vermeil?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Phew... Frostleaf.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: (*gulp*––)
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Did you bring a knife? Can you lend it to me real quick?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Mm, here.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Thanks. I have nothing of value on me right now. I'll think of some way to repay you later.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Um, what exactly are you doing?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Cutting this wire here. Then, inserting the knife into this keyhole...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Where did you learn to do stuff like this?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: The mercenary camp in Ursus. Give it a few tries and you'll figure it out.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ...Wait, that's not the point! Are you trying to force open the kitchen door?!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Yes, because that's where the kitchenware is... I need some.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: You need to stop that, now. If someone sees you, they might think you're a thief...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Speaking of which, where's the usual worker from Logistics? Why aren't they here right now?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Found the lock cylinder. All that's left is...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Okay. Door's open.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I'm back–– Vermeil? Where'd you go?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: The staff worker's back!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Vermeil, hurry up and leave already–– Huh? Why are you going inside?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: First pot secured. Second pot...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Huh? Is someone in the kitchen?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Shoot, this is bad.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Just one more chunk of beast meat.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Vermeil! Go!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: *pant*, *pant*... Nobody's chasing after us, right?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Nope... Frostleaf, you sure bolted out of there with the meat.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I don't think that's anything to be proud of... W-Wait, what are you doing now?!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Starting a fire.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: How are you going to start a fire HERE? And isn't it just going to trigger the alarm?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Nope. I come here all the time.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ...In any case, I really need to get going.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: The bar's already closed.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I grabbed two pots. This one, for the herbs. This one, for stewed meat.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Stewed meat?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: You helped me, so I'll give you some in return. Is that good enough?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: In return? What I did hardly counts as helping you out... Plus–
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Fair trade. That's the rule.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ...Way back in Columbia, I saw some of the settlers in the barrens trading. The hunters would exchange their catch with the tribesmen for their daily necessities.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: That's how they could step into the wastes, one day at a time. Abiding by those rules.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Sounds familiar. Reminds me of my old life... A long, long time ago, before I was brought to Rhodes Island. Maybe even before that.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Someone brought you to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: He said it was to treat my condition. And that my medical bills were already paid for.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: He didn't seem like a bad guy, but... he could hardly be called a good guy either. I didn't trust him. Things don't work like that in these lands.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Then, you should talk things through with the Doctor. The Doctor is a good person, and looks the part too.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I already told the Doctor, or whatever. What I said is, I don't need anybody's charity. I earn my keep, and work for everything I have.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Didn't say anything back, so they must have agreed.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ...Rhodes Island isn't that kind of place.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: You don't need to try and fool me. I've been to plenty of places outside the wilds. Ursus camps, and other settlements outside.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: It's true that you don't always need to trade with what you hunt yourself, but in places where you don't, you use shiny golden coins instead.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Every place has been like that, and I've seen plenty.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Oh, the water's ready.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Pour the water over the meat... and use the remaining water to boil the herbs. And then, close the lid.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Now we're good. Just give it a little while.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: The Vulpo girl wipes her hands on the walls out of habit, then squats down on the edge of the platform. She looks outside blankly.
Rhodes Island is sailing across the land, and beneath its strong headlights, one can clearly see the gravel in its path being ground into fine dust.
A gust of wind sweeps across the barrens, and in its wake, not even that dust remains.
As long as I sit here... Nobody will bother me. I can sit here for a long time.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is a good place. A good home beyond home.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: But it is not my home...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Frostleaf looks at the back of the small figure in front of her and lets out a soft sigh.
Suddenly, she approaches that figure, and brings her headphones close to Vermeil.
The next moment, the sound of music flows into Vermeil's ears.
♪Don't need your promise, don't need your gifts♪
♪The sun always rises, and that's all it takes♪
♪So grab my hand, and let's set out on a trip♪
♪To the far horizon, or what's beyond it♪
This song... reminds me of what my old tribe used to sing. When we'd divide all the food up among us, and sing while clapping on the table...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Thanks for sharing it with me. I'll find a way to—
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: The value of a song can't be measured, and it's not something you can trade for. The same is also true for... a whole lot of other things.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: How about this... If I can't stay here, then after I leave, I'll think carefully about your words.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Leave? For good? Where are you going?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I can't stay in Rhodes Island. They won't let me.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Who's they?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Mm. The sun's about to come up. I need to hurry up and make the final push...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: What a pain... I've stayed up so many nights now that I can't even fall asleep...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Why does the hallway smell like burnt wood... *sniff* Whoa, something smells good.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Is that Vermeil... and Frostleaf?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Someone's found us. Vermeil?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Ver—
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: She's gone... along with the pot.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Wait––
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Seriously, where did that kid run off to?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: After making her way to the cafeteria, she disappeared without a trace... Could she be linked to that kitchen break-in last night?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But there are way too many people who'd do that sort of thing, and Vermeil isn't one of the usual suspects.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: *sigh* I'm so hungry... I've been so caught up trying to find her that I forgot to eat dinner.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I wonder if there's anything left of the food Gavial hid in the office. It might not be healthy, but...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It should be fine as long as I only pick out the vegetables... right? I mean, I need to keep my energy up to continue searching. And it's not like Gavial would mind... right?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: *sigh*...
(A noise coming from the office? Is someone working overtime?)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hello? Is someone in here?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Vermeil! So this is where you were!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Are you working overtime, Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Where have you been? I was looking all over for you!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why did you suddenly cancel today's treatment? Why did you say you were leaving Rhodes Island? Your Oripathy has only been temporarily suppressed, so you're far from being fully healed up!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm telling you now – you better have a good explanation! Otherwise, I'm not letting you out of my sight!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't tell me... Has someone been bullying you?! Don't worry, you tell me who it is, and I'll give them a piece of my mind!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I have something for you.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: For me?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Here–
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: (This pot... I think I've seen it in the cafeteria before...)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Should I open the lid? What's inside?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I was told that Medical has been very busy lately, and none of you are getting much sleep.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I've also gone days without sleeping while out on the hunt. There are some herbs that make you feel a lot better when you boil them all together.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I made some for you. Drink it, and if you feel better, that means I can do something helpful. And I will continue doing that for you.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Maybe then, that'll mean... that I can finally stay at Rhodes Island for my treatment.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: (Opens the lid)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Whoa... It smells amazing. Is this stewed meat?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Wrong one!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Oh no, I... I must've grabbed the wrong pot! Hibiscus, let me go get the right one! Just wait here!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Hold on... You've been waiting here the whole time? Just to give me this?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's the reason you've been missing for the whole day?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But this isn't what I wanted to give you...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: But why did you say you have to give me that... herbal soup, before you can receive treatment?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Because my job's gone. If I want to stay here and continue getting treatment, then I need a new job. There's not much else I know how to do... Just this one thing.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: What are you talking about? I specifically went to confirm with HR, and the approval for your provisional period will be issued soon.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But yesterday, someone from the HR Department contacted me and said that I no longer need to go on field operations.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Then I saw on my terminal that my applications for field operations for today, tomorrow, and next week had all been canceled.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: They won't let me stay here.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: ...Vermeil, this is all a huge misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's just... a misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: HR cancelled your missions... because you're on vacation right now.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You've been doing way too much field work since you joined the company! I was worried that you were putting too much strain on your body, so I asked Medical to grant you special leave.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: And that leave officially began yesterday morning!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Vacation? That means... I don't have to work, but can still receive treatment...?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: You're so silly. You've gone on so many field operations, and have done so much for all of us. How could you not be one of us?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm one of you... Is that what you really believe?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Of course. So there's no need to worry about how much you have to pay us back. None of us care about that.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's your holiday right now, so you can do whatever you want, however you want. And we'll absolutely support you the whole way.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is somewhere you can be at ease. That's why it exists in the first place.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Do you get it now?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Even if you don't, that's fine too! In any case, now that I've figured out what's going on... Phew, that's a load off my chest!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, uhh, the pot of stewed meat! Quickly, find somewhere to put it! Since you made it for me, it can't hurt to try a few pieces, right?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, what is Rhodes Island to you...?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Here, take these utensils. Let's eat up! Dig in, and don't be shy! We need to finish everything before they show up to start their shift...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Huh? What were you asking me?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: ...Never mind, it's nothing.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Five days later, on the last day of Vermeil's vacation.
Good morning, Vermeil.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Good morning, Lina.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: You're right on time today too. Hibiscus is waiting for you inside.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Vermeil stands outside, quietly looking at the doorplate of the Medical Department.
After a brief moment, she turns and walks inside the room.
Behind her, a handmade textile that she wove herself hangs silently on the door.
